title: Lee Soo-chul
text:
Lee Soo-Chul (<a href="Hangul">Hangul</a>: 이수철; <a href="Hanja">Hanja</a>: 李壽澈; May 20, 1966 – October 18, 2011) was a South Korean footballer and <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> manager.
He played for Ulsan Hyundai FC as a forward, and was manager of <a href="Sangju%20Sangmu%20Phoenix">Sangju Sangmu Phoenix</a> at the time of his death.
Lee was found dead on October 18, 2011, in an apparent suicide. He was 45.
